title: Drive reduction as a motivational concept is best

content.prompt: Drive reduction as a motivational concept is best exemplified by which of the following?

choices.label: Electric stimulation to the pleasure center of the brain
A monkey using its tail as a fifth limb to climb higher in a tree
The injection of heroin by an addict to avoid withdrawal symptoms

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
